backend/main.mo: Defines core types and state for hotels, rooms, bookings, payments, and invite tokens, integrating storage, authorization, and migration mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a no-op migration module that returns old actor state unchanged while defining legacy structure schemas.
feature_evidence.json: Structured report listing requested features, related files, components, and test IDs for compatibility restoration and room upload fixes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of key frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, state, and compatibility handling.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styling with OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets metadata and loads the React app from main.tsx.
frontend/REGRESSION_CHECKLIST.md: Comprehensive regression checklist covering compatibility, admin features, hotel flows, room uploads, and error handling before release.
frontend/RELEASE_NOTES.md: Template documenting release details with v47 notes focused on backend compatibility restoration and blob-based room photo uploads.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the React app root, query client, and full routing tree with authentication and role gates.
frontend/src/buildInfo.ts: Exports the app build version constant.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBooki: Admin panel showing all bookings with loading, error, and table views, including booking details and hotel lookup.
frontend/src/components/admin/CaffeineDe: Displays an admin notice about a known deploy UI issue on the Caffeine platform.
frontend/src/components/admin/DataCleanu: Admin utility for removing legacy room photos and payment methods by hotel principal and room ID.
frontend/src/components/admin/HotelVisib: Admin interface to view hotels and update their activation and subscription status.
frontend/src/components/admin/InviteToke: Panel for generating and managing invite codes, with options for max uses and optional bound principals.
frontend/src/components/admin/PrincipalP: UI panel allowing admins to validate a principal ID and trigger a purge mutation with confirmation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with role requirements and optional hotel activation flow.
frontend/src/components/auth/GuardErrorS: Shows an error screen for failed permission checks with retry and navigation options.
frontend/src/components/auth/HotelActiva: Handles invite token validation and hotel account activation with related query refreshes.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileComp: Prompts authenticated users without a profile to complete basic profile fields before continuing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps content and requires Internet Identity authentication, showing a login prompt if needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Enforces role-based access, optional hotel activation checks, and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingD: Shows a dialog with detailed booking info including dates, guests, price, status, and optional user principal copying.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingF: Provides a form for creating bookings with validation, price calculation, and booking submission handling.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingS: Renders a badge showing a booking’s status with variant and label mapping.
frontend/src/components/booking/MyBookin: Displays the logged-in user's bookings with status, details dialog access, and cancel functionality.
frontend/src/components/common/ImagePrev: Shows a full-screen dialog for previewing an image with a close button.
frontend/src/components/debug/AuthDiagno: Displays real-time authentication, role, and hotel profile diagnostic info for debugging.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelBooki: Lists hotel bookings with options to confirm or cancel and supports viewing booking details.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelPayme: UI panel to view, add, and remove hotel payment methods using profile query/update hooks, with form validation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelProfi: Form-driven panel for editing hotel name, location, address, map link, and contact details with profile fetch and update logic.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RecordStay: Static panel informing users that stay-recording functionality is unavailable until backend support is implemented.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomPhotos: Displays room photos with support for viewing, replacing, and deleting images, including error tracking for failed URLs.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomsPanel: Manages creation, editing, and deletion of hotel rooms, including pricing, promo validation, image uploads, and photo management.
frontend/src/components/hotel/Subscripti: Shows subscription status with badges and alerts, and displays instructions when the subscription is inactive or in test mode.
App layout wrapper providing navigation, main content area, and footer with build version.
frontend/src/components/nav/LanguageSele: Language selector component allowing switching the app locale, currently supporting English only.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Navigation bar showing links based on user authentication, admin role, and hotel activation, with login/logout handling.
frontend/src/components/payments/Contact: Displays admin contact info and payment methods for hotel activation or subscription with WhatsApp and email actions.
frontend/src/components/payments/HotelPa: Shows a hotel’s payment methods and provides buttons to contact the hotel via WhatsApp or email.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, state management, and stored identity restoration through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user roles, profiles, and hotel-related data using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomImageUpload.ts: Handles image upload with validation, progress tracking, error handling, and support for single or multiple uploads.
frontend/src/i18n/LocaleContext.tsx: Simple locale context allowing storing and updating the current UI language in localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, borders, and UI elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AccountStatusPage.tsx: Displays user identity, roles, hotel activation state, and actions like copying principal, refreshing status, and requesting admin access.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard with panels for invites, hotel visibility, bookings, data cleanup, and principal purging.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseHotelsPage.tsx: Fetches and lists hotels with thumbnails, handling preview dialogs and image errors, and navigates to hotel details.
frontend/src/pages/GuestAccountPage.tsx: Shows guest account actions including navigating to bookings, browsing hotels, and displaying the user's bookings table.
frontend/src/pages/HotelAreaPage.tsx: Loads the caller’s hotel profile and displays management tabs for profile, rooms, payments, bookings, and subscriptions with error handling.
frontend/src/pages/HotelDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed hotel info including address, contact, payment methods, room listings, and booking form, with loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/MainMenuPage.tsx: Renders the main menu with navigation to guest and hotel portals, using auth and role queries to determine access.
frontend/src/pages/MyBookingsPage.tsx: Displays the user's bookings with navigation shortcuts to browsing hotels and viewing account status.
frontend/src/types/extended-backend.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and enums for bookings, hotels, rooms, users, and related backend data structures.
frontend/src/utils/debugFlags.ts: Provides a helper to check if debug mode is enabled based on environment or URL parameters.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Contains currency formatting utilities and supported currency definitions for consistent money display.
frontend/src/utils/roomBlobStorage.ts: Implements placeholder image upload functions returning data URLs with optional progress tracking.
frontend/src/utils/roomPictures.ts: Provides utilities for validating, filtering, and tracking failures of room picture URLs.
frontend/src/utils/roomPricing.ts: Offers bigint-safe promo validation and discounted price calculations plus promo display formatting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state, issues, and required fixes, focusing on restoring stable hotel/admin behavior and improving the room upload feature. Lists existing features, known regressions, and policy constraints for upcoming work.
